title: Enhancing Multi-task Learning Capability of Medical Generalist Foundation Model via Image-centric Multi-annotation Data
details: X Zhu, F Mo, Z Zhang, J Wang, Y Shi, M Wu, C Zhang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: The emergence of medical generalist foundation models has revolutionized conventional task-specific model development paradigms, aiming to better handle multiple tasks through joint training on large-scale medical datasets. However, recent …
